definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: Also, the precision of machine tools for die machining and microfabrication has improved.
sentences.chinese: 此外，爲機牀模具加工和微細加工精度有所改善。

sentences.english: The new pre-charging technology is promising for thecapturing fine particles in electrostatic enhancement filters or electrostatic precipitators.
sentences.chinese: 這種新型的預荷電技術能有效的捕集微細塵粒。

sentences.english: Fine calcium carbonate dentifrices ingredients effectively clean teeth, a healthier mouth.
sentences.chinese: 微細碳酸鈣潔齒成份，有效清潔牙齒，口腔更健康。

sentences.english: The delicate fiber-shaped structure recreates the interlacing shadows of the bamboo forest.
sentences.chinese: 微細纖維狀造型，交錯編織光影時空。

sentences.english: Gold is fine grained, associated with strong silicification.
sentences.chinese: 黃金爲微細顆粒，與強硅化作用伴生。

sentences.english: It also introduces micro-machining technology development tendency.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了微細加工技術的發展趨勢。

sentences.english: Pelagic sediment contains tiny grain of material.
sentences.chinese: 遠洋沉積物包含了微細物質顆粒。

sentences.english: Gaolong microdisseminated gold deposit is located in Tianlin County in northwestern Guangxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 桂西北高龍微細浸染型金礦牀位於廣西田林縣高龍鄉。

sentences.english: Two micro-disseminated gold metallogenic belts are discovered and affirmed.
sentences.chinese: 發現並肯定兩條微細浸染型金礦化帶。

sentences.english: In general, fine particles tend to clump and agglomerate if they are moist or tacky.
sentences.chinese: 通常，潮溼和粘性的微細顆粒易於聚集結塊。

sentences.english: Calcareous siltstone is the main host rock of micro fine disseminated gold deposit(MDGD).
sentences.chinese: 微細浸染型金礦賦礦岩石以鈣質粉砂岩爲主。

sentences.english: Pulse power supply with micro energy is a core technique for micro-EDM.
sentences.chinese: 微能脈衝電源是微細電火花加工的一項關鍵技術。

sentences.english: Finally, the future of ultra-precision machining and micro-machining is also described ill this paper.
sentences.chinese: 展望超精密加工技術在微細加工領域的發展前景。

sentences.english: Research on micro-meso-scopic properties of BTS.
sentences.chinese: 輕質混合土微細觀特徵的研究。

sentences.english: Then there remains only the alaya consciousness and half of the subtle functions of the manas.
sentences.chinese: 其中唯留阿賴耶識，全於末那半分微細。
